title: Profound words about learning the Quran
transcript: unfortunately if you lit a torch and then you don't see the light there's nothing wrong with the torch if your eyes are closed it's your vision that is impaired the torch is fine the light is shining but it is your vision that is impaired we have the book we have the torch there is nothing more worthy of being pondered upon than the quran there is nothing to reflect upon that is better than the quran where you should focus to understand
